body_html:
@carpodaster I integrated the new font-face and colors so that the app aligns with the styling of railsgirlssummerofcode.com. So that when you click on the "Home" button, the styling doesn't completely change and it's clear that the teams-app is part of RGSoC.

Here you go:

body:
@carpodaster I integrated the new font-face and colors so that the app aligns with the styling of railsgirlssummerofcode.com. So that when you click on the "Home" button, the styling doesn't completely change and it's clear that the teams-app is part of RGSoC.

Here you go:

![style-improvements](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11146524/8800978/679bfc6e-2fb7-11e5-9926-7ec3a198f9de.png)

![screen shot 2015-07-21 at 14 28 23](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11146524/8800651/da9d909a-2fb4-11e5-9204-c521bdab4ad6.png)

![screen shot 2015-07-21 at 14 32 09](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11146524/8800726/67463876-2fb5-11e5-9682-b141bb8e5a7f.png)
